about.title: About Us
about.body: Founded in 2020, we're a team of dedicated professionals committed to helping businesses succeed. Our client-first approach and proven track record speak for themselves.
about.subtitle: Why choose us

products.name: Starter Package
products.description: Perfect for new businesses. Includes consultation, basic setup, and 1 month support.

products.name: Growth Package
products.description: For growing businesses. Everything in Starter plus advanced features and 3 months support.

products.name: Enterprise Package
products.description: Full-service solution. Custom strategy, priority support, and dedicated account manager.

testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it

items.author: Sarah Johnson

items.question: How quickly can we get started?
items.answer: Most clients start within 1-2 business days of initial consultation. We work on your timeline.

items.question: What's included in the packages?
items.answer: Each package includes consultation, implementation, training, and ongoing support. Specific features vary by tier.

items.question: Do you offer custom solutions?
items.answer: Absolutely! While our packages cover most needs, we can create custom solutions for unique requirements.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy, we'll make it right or provide a full refund.

items.question: Can I upgrade my package later?
items.answer: Yes! You can upgrade anytime. We'll credit your existing package towards the upgrade cost.
